desc: Bone Creek Farm -Industrial Hemp farm and CBD distributors located in Deposit, NY. Specializing in hemp agriculture. Hemp Oil, Salve, soap and lotion. Helping to reduce pain, anxiety, sleep issues and many other health benefits. Our products come in different varieties such as topical, tinctures, smokeables and soaps

layout.text: Discover a healthier and happier life through our line of CBD products.
